animation.title: Animation
animation.description: An animation is a set of keyframes that can be applied to an element.

control.title: Element
control.description: An element is a control that can be added to a screen. It can be a button, a label, an image, etc.

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: The controls that are contained within this element.

control_name.title: Control Name
control_name.description: The control to apply the operation to.

array_name.title: Array Name
array_name.description: The array to apply the operation to.

color1.description: The color to start the gradient with.

color2.description: The color to end the gradient with.

A.title: Variable Definition
A.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

D.title: Variable
D.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

anyOf.title: Element Reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an element using the following syntax: [element_name]@[namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Element Reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an element using the following syntax: [namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Variable Reference
anyOf.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

E.title: Animation Reset Name
E.description: The name of the animation that will be reset.

G.title: Destroy At End
G.description: If set, the given element will be destroyed at the end of the animation.

H.title: Disable Anim Fast Forward
H.description: If true, the animation will not be fast forwarded.

BC.title: End Event
BC.description: The event that will be triggered when the animation ends.

BE.title: Frame Count
BE.description: The number of frames in the animation.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BH.title: From
BH.description: The starting point of the animation.

BJ.title: Initial UV
BJ.description: The initial UV of the animation.

CA.title: Next
CA.description: The name of the next element.

CB.title: Play Event
CB.description: The event that will be played.

CC.title: Propagate Alpha
CC.description: If true, this element will apply the same alpha value to its controlled element(s).

CD.title: Reversible
CD.description: If true, the animation will be reversible.

CE.title: Scale From Starting Alpha
CE.description: If true, the animation will scale from the starting alpha.

CF.title: To
CF.description: The ending point of the animation.

CI_binding.title: Binding
CI_binding.description: A binding that is contained within this element.

binding_collection_name.title: Binding Collection Name
binding_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_collection_prefix.title: Binding Collection Prefix
binding_collection_prefix.description: The prefix of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_condition.title: Binding Condition
binding_condition.description: The condition that must be met for the binding to be applied.

binding_name.title: Binding Name
binding_name.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

binding_name_override.title: Binding Name Override
binding_name_override.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

binding_type.title: Binding Type
binding_type.description: The type of the binding. The default is global.

ignored.title: Ignored
ignored.description: If true, the binding will be ignored.

resolve_sibling_scope.title: Resolve Sibling Scope
resolve_sibling_scope.description: If true, the binding will resolve sibling scope.

source_control_name.title: Source Control Name
source_control_name.description: The name of the control that the binding is in.

source_property_name.title: Source Property Name
source_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

target_property_name.title: Target Property Name
target_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

CI.title: Bindings
CI.description: The bindings that are contained within this element.

anyOf.title: Binding
anyOf.description: The binding that is contained within this element.

CJ.title: Allow Clipping
CJ.description: If true, the element will allow clipping.

DA.title: Allow Debug Missing Texture
DA.description: If true, the element will show the black and purple placeholder texture if the referenced image is not found.

DB.title: Allow Scroll Even When Content Fits
DB.description: If true, the element will allow scrolling even when the content fits.

DD.title: Always Handle Pointer
DD.description: If true, the element will always handle the pointer.

DE.title: Always Handle Scrolling
DE.description: If true, the element will always handle scrolling.

DF.title: Always Listen To Input
DF.description: If true, the element will always listen to input.

DG.title: Always Rotate
DG.description: If true, the element will always rotate.

DI.title: Anchor
DI.description: An anchor is a reference to an element in the UI.

DH.title: Anchor From
DH.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DJ.title: Anchor To
DJ.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

EA.title: Animations
EA.description: The animations that are contained within this element.

EB.title: Background Control
EB.description: The control that will be used for the background.

EC.title: Background Hover Control
EC.description: The control that will be used for the background when hovered.

ED.title: Backup Font Type
ED.description: The type of the backup font.

EE.title: Bilinear
EE.description: If true, the element will use bilinear filtering.

EF.title: Button Mappings
EF.description: The button mappings that are contained within this element.

EG.title: Cache Screen
EG.description: If true, the screen will be cached.

EH.title: Camera Tilt Degrees
EH.description: The degrees the camera is tilted for a paper doll renderer.

EI.title: Checked Control
EI.description: The control that will be checked.

EJ.title: Checked Hover Control
EJ.description: The control that will be checked when hovered.

FA.title: Checked Locked Control
FA.description: The control that will be checked when locked.

FB.title: Checked Locked Hover Control
FB.description: The control that will be checked when locked and hovered.

FC.title: Clip Direction
FC.description: The direction that the element will be clipped in.

FD.title: Clip Pixel Perfect
FD.description: If true, the element will be clipped pixel perfect.

FE.title: Clips Children
FE.description: If true, the element will clip its children.

FF.title: Close On Player Hurt
FF.description: If true, the element will close when the player is hurt.

FG.title: Collection Index
FG.description: The index of the collection that the element is in.

FH.title: Collection Name
FH.description: The name of the collection that the element is in.

GA.title: Animation Reference
GA.description: A reference to an animation element using the following syntax: [animation_name]@[namespace_reference].[animation_name_reference]

FI.title: Color
FI.description: The color of the text. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

GC.title: Consume Hover Events
GC.description: If true, the element will consume hover events.

GD.title: Contained
GD.description: If true, the element will be contained.

GF.title: Default Control
GF.description: The default control that will be focused.

GG.title: Default Focus Precedence
GG.description: The default focus precedence of the element.

GH.title: Draggable
GH.description: If true, the element will be draggable.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

GI.title: Dropdown Area
GI.description: The area that the dropdown will be in.

HA.title: Dropdown Content Control
HA.description: The control that will be used for the dropdown content.

HC.title: Enable Directional Toggling
HC.description: If true, the element will enable directional toggling.

HD.title: Enable Profanity Filter
HD.description: If true, the element will enable the profanity filter.

HE.title: Enabled Newline
HE.description: If true, the element will be enabled when a new line is created.

HF.title: Enabled
HF.description: If true, the element will be enabled.

HH.title: Control IDs
HH.description: The IDs of the controls that will be created by the factory.

HG.title: Factory
HG.description: The factory that will be used to create the element.

control_name.title: Control Name
control_name.description: The name of the control that will be created by the factory.

factory_variables.title: Factory Variables
factory_variables.description: The variables that will be used by the factory.

HI.title: Fill
HI.description: If true, the element will fill the screen.

ID.title: Focus Container
ID.description: If true, the element will be a focus container.

IE.title: Focus Enabled
IE.description: If true, the element will be focus enabled.

IF.title: Focus Identifier
IF.description: The identifier of the element that will be focused.

IG.title: Focus Magnet Enabled
IG.description: If true, the element will be focus magnet enabled.

IH.title: Focus Mapping
IH.description: If true, the element will be focus magnet enabled.
IH.$comment: The only place this is used in vanilla is in beacon_screen.json and it doesn't give much information

IJ.title: Navigation Mode
IJ.description: The navigation mode of the UI.

II.title: Focus Navigation Mode Down
II.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating down.

JA.title: Focus Navigation Mode Left
JA.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating left.

JB.title: Focus Navigation Mode Right
JB.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating right.

JC.title: Focus Navigation Mode Up
JC.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating up.

JD.title: Focus Wrap Enabled
JD.description: If true, the element will be focus wrap enabled.

JE.title: Font Scale Factor
JE.description: The scale factor of the font.

JH.title: Force Render Below
JH.description: If true, the element will be rendered below the screen.

JI.title: Force Texture Reload
JI.description: If true, the texture will be reloaded.

JJ.title: Grid Dimension Binding
JJ.description: The binding that will be used for the grid dimension.

BAB.title: Grid Item Template
BAB.description: The template that will be used for the grid item.

BAD.title: Grid Rescaling Type
BAD.description: The type of the grid rescaling.

BAE.title: Handle Deselect
BAE.description: If true, the element will handle deselect.

BAF.title: Handle Select
BAF.description: If true, the element will handle select.

BAG.title: Hide Hyphen
BAG.description: If true, the element will hide the hyphen.

BAH.title: Hover Control
BAH.description: The control that will be hovered.

BAI.title: Hover Enabled
BAI.description: If true, the element will be hover enabled.

BAJ.title: Ignored
BAJ.description: If true, the element will be ignored.

BBA.title: Images
BBA.description: The images that are contained within this element.

BBC.title: Indent Control
BBC.description: The control that will be indented.

BBD.title: Inherit Max Sibling Height
BBD.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum height of its siblings.

BBE.title: Inherit Max Sibling Width
BBE.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum width of its siblings.

BBF.title: Is Modal
BBF.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BBG.title: Is Showing Menu
BBG.description: If true, the element will be showing the menu.

BBH.title: Jump To Bottom On Update
BBH.description: If true, the element will jump to the bottom when updated.

BBI.title: Keep Ratio
BBI.description: If true, the element will keep its ratio.

BBJ.title: Layer
BBJ.description: The layer that the element will be rendered in. Higher layers are rendered on top of lower layers.

BCB.title: Localize
BCB.description: If true, the element will be localized.

BCC.title: Locked Control
BCC.description: The control that will be locked.

BCD.title: Low Frequency Rendering
BCD.description: If true, the element will be rendered at a lower frequency.

BCE.title: Max Length
BCE.description: The maximum length of the text. If the text is longer than this, it will be truncated.

BCF.title: Max Size
BCF.description: The maximum size of the element.

BCH.title: Maximum Grid Items
BCH.description: The maximum number of grid items.

BCI.title: Min Size
BCI.description: The minimum size of the element.

BCJ.title: Modal
BCJ.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BDA.title: Offset
BDA.description: The offset of the element from the anchor point. horizontal by vertical.

BDC.title: Place Holder Control
BDC.description: The control that will be used for the place holder.

BDD.title: Pressed Control
BDD.description: The control that will be pressed.

BDE.title: Prevent Touch Input
BDE.description: If true, touch input will be prevented from passing through this element.

BDG.title: Progress Control
BDG.description: The control that will be used for the progress.

BDH.title: Progress Hover Control
BDH.description: The control that will be used for the progress when hovered.

BDI.title: Property Bag
BDI.description: The property bag that will be used by the element.

BEA.title: Radio Toggle Group
BEA.description: The radio toggle group that the element is in.

BEB.title: Render Game Behind
BEB.description: If true, the game will be rendered behind the element.

BEC.title: Render Only When Topmost
BEC.description: If true, the element will only be rendered when it is the topmost element.

BED.title: Renderer
BED.description: The renderer that will be used by the element.

BEE.title: Reset Event
BEE.description: The event that will be reset.

BEF.title: Reset On Focus Lost
BEF.description: If true, the element will be reset when focus is lost.

BEG.title: Rotate Speed
BEG.description: The speed that the element will rotate at.

BEH.title: Screen Draws Last
BEH.description: If true, the screen will be drawn last.

BEI.title: Screen Not Flushable
BEI.description: If true, the screen will not be flushed when the element is added.

BEJ.title: Scroll Box And Track Panel
BEJ.description: The panel that will be used for the scroll box and track.

BFA.title: Scroll Content
BFA.description: The content that will be scrolled.

BFB.title: Scroll Speed
BFB.description: The speed that the element will scroll at.

BFC.title: Scroll View Port
BFC.description: The view port that the element will be scrolled in.

BFE.title: Scrollbar Touch Button
BFE.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar touch.

BFF.title: Scrollbar Track Button
BFF.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar track.

BFH.title: Send Telemetry
BFH.description: If true, the element will send telemetry.

BFI.title: Shadow
BFI.description: If true, the text will have a shadow.

BFJ.title: Should Steal Mouse
BFJ.description: If true, the element will steal the mouse.

BGB.title: Slider Box Control
BGB.description: The control that will be used for the slider box.

BGC.title: Slider Collection Name
BGC.description: The name of the collection that the slider is in.

BGD.title: Slider Deselected Button
BGD.description: The button that will be used for the slider deselected.

BGG.title: Slider Select On Hover
BGG.description: If true, the slider will select on hover.

BGH.title: Slider Selected Button
BGH.description: The button that will be used for the slider selected.

BGI.title: Slider Small Decrease Button
BGI.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BGJ.title: Slider Small Increase Button
BGJ.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BHB.title: Slider Track Button
BHB.description: The button that will be used for the slider track.

BHG.title: Text Box Name
BHG.description: The name of the text box.

BHH.title: Text Control
BHH.description: The control that will be used for the text.

BHI.title: Text Edit Box Grid Collection Name
BHI.description: The name of the collection that the text edit box grid is in.

BIC.title: Texture File System
BIC.description: The file system that the texture is in.

BIE.title: Tiled
BIE.description: If true, the texture will be tiled.

BIF.title: Toggle Default State
BIF.description: The default state of the toggle.

BIG.title: Toggle Grid Collection Name
BIG.description: The name of the collection that the toggle grid is in.

BIH.title: Toggle Group Default Selected
BIH.description: The default selected toggle of the toggle group.

BII.title: Toggle Group Forced Index
BII.description: The forced index of the toggle group.

BJA.title: Toggle Off Button
BJA.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BJB.title: Toggle On Button
BJB.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BJC.title: Touch Mode
BJC.description: The touch mode of the element.

BJD.title: TTS Control Header
BJD.description: The header of the TTS control.

BJE.title: TTS Control Type Order Priority
BJE.description: The priority of the TTS control type order.

BJG.title: TTS Ignore Subsections
BJG.description: If true, the element will ignore subsections.

BJH.title: TTS Index Priority
BJH.description: The priority of the TTS index.

BJI.title: TTS Inherit Siblings
BJI.description: If true, the element will inherit its siblings.

CAA.title: TTS Override Control Value
CAA.description: If true, the TTS will override the control value.

CAB.title: TTS Section Header
CAB.description: The header of the TTS section.

CAC.title: TTS Toggle Off
CAC.description: If true, the TTS will toggle off.

CAD.title: TTS Toggle On
CAD.description: If true, the TTS will toggle on.

CAE.title: TTS Value Changed
CAE.description: If true, the TTS value will change.

CAF.title: TTS Value Order Priority
CAF.description: The priority of the TTS value order.

CAI.title: Unchecked Control
CAI.description: The control that will be unchecked.

CAJ.title: Unchecked Hover Control
CAJ.description: The control that will be unchecked when hovered.

CBA.title: Unchecked Locked Control
CBA.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked.

CBB.title: Unchecked Locked Hover Control
CBB.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked and hovered.

CBC.title: Use Anchored Offset
CBC.description: If true, the element will use the anchored offset.

CBD.title: Use Child Anchors
CBD.description: If true, this element will stack its controlled element in respect to their anchor values.

CBF.title: Use Last Focus
CBF.description: If true, the element will use the last focus.

CBG_variables.title: Variable Definition
CBG_variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

CBG.title: Variables
CBG.description: The variables that are contained within this element.

CBH.title: Virtual Keyboard Buffer Control
CBH.description: The control that will be used for the virtual keyboard buffer.

CBI.title: Visible
CBI.description: If true, the element will be visible.

CBJ.title: Zip Folder
CBJ.description: The folder that the element will be zipped into.
